Headers

Top line metrics - 36px Helvetica Neue Bold for IBM

Embedded assistance, first time use, guidance - 22px Helvetica Neue Light for IBM

Page title, side bar/nav titles - 17px Helvetica Neue Bold for IBM

Product titles, widget titles, modal titles - 15px Helvetica Neue Bold for IBM

Top menu bar links - 15px Helvetica Neue Roman for IBM
Contextual actions/links (non-top menu bar links), field hints - 13px Helvetica Neue Roman for IBM

Content

Content, buttons, dropdowns, toggles, tabs, labels - 14px Helvetica Neue Roman for IBM (default)

Mini text information (card panel main content) - 12px Helvetica Neue Roman for IBM

Charting labels - 11px Helvetica Neue Roman for IBM

Color usage

Headers: Gray 80, #323232

Standard text: Gray 60, #5a5a5a (default)

Contextual buttons, field hints: $gray50: #777677

Nav bar links on Gray 70 background: $blue20: #7cc7ff

Nav bar icons on Gray 80 nav: $gray10-50: #EFEFEF

High contrast mode for icons (that arenâ€™t contextual actions or in buttons): $gray10-50: #EFEFEF

Disabled text and buttons on white: $gray40: #959595

Disabled text and buttons on gray background: $gray20: #C7C7C7
